description.brief: An ancient being tasked with maintaining the stability of time itself, wielding power over temporal flows and chronological paradoxes.
description.physical: Tall and ethereal with silver hair that seems to shimmer with temporal energy. His eyes reflect different time periods simultaneously.
description.personality: Wise but burdened by the weight of countless timelines. Patient yet decisive when temporal threats emerge.

background.summary: Born during the Great Temporal Convergence, Aethon was chosen by the cosmic forces to become a guardian of time's flow.

history.event: Born during the Great Temporal Convergence
Underwent the Ritual of Temporal Binding
Prevented the Paradox of Endless Noon

relationships.description: Fellow guardian who can perceive potential futures
Rogue chronarch who seeks to shatter temporal barriers

abilities.name: Temporal Sight
abilities.description: Can perceive multiple timelines simultaneously and see the consequences of temporal changes

abilities.name: Chronostasis
abilities.description: Can freeze time in localized areas for brief periods

abilities.name: Timeline Repair
abilities.description: Ability to mend minor temporal fractures and paradoxes

quotes.text: Time is not a river that flows in one direction, but an ocean with currents that touch all shores.
quotes.context: Teaching a young apprentice about temporal mechanics
quotes.source: Chronicles of the Nexus, Volume III

quotes.text: Every moment exists forever in the weave of time. Our choices determine which threads we follow.
quotes.context: Before the battle to repair the Shattered Timeline
